description: This dashboard is designed to match the counters mentioned in document published by QUEST SOFTWARE on "SQL Server Perfmon Counters of Interest"

panels.description:
Unused physical memory (not page file).
Should be greater than 2 GB
panels.title: Memory - Available Mbytes

panels.description:
Pages Input/Sec
-- Should be less than 10
-- Reads from hard disk per second to resolve
hard pages.

Pages/Sec
Often referenced in older documentation.
Useful only in combination with Pages
Input/Sec, %Usage, %Usage Peak.

targets.rawSql:
SET TRANSACTION ISOLATION LEVEL READ UNCOMMITTED;
SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER OFF
DECLARE @sql varchar(max) = "
declare @p_start_time datetime2;
declare @p_end_time datetime2;

select @p_start_time = st.local_time, @p_end_time = et.local_time 
from dbo.utc2local($__timeFrom()) as st join dbo.utc2local($__timeTo()) et on 1 = 1;

SELECT l2u.utc_time as time,counter_name, CEILING(cntr_value) as cntr_value
FROM (
		select pc.collection_time, pc.counter_name, pc.cntr_value
		from dbo.dm_os_performance_counters_nonsql as pc
		where ( collection_time BETWEEN @p_start_time AND @p_end_time )
			and pc.[object_name] = 'Memory'
			and pc.counter_name in ('Pages Input/Sec','Pages/Sec')
		--
		union all
		--
		select pc.collection_time, pc.counter_name, pc.cntr_value
		from dbo.dm_os_performance_counters_nonsql_aggregated as pc
		where ( collection_time BETWEEN @p_start_time AND @p_end_time )
			and pc.[object_name] = 'Memory'
			and pc.counter_name in ('Pages Input/Sec','Pages/Sec')
) AS data
cross apply dbo.local2utc(collection_time) as l2u
order by collection_time;
"
SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON
IF ('$server' = SERVERPROPERTY('ServerName'))
BEGIN
  EXEC (@sql);
END;
ELSE
BEGIN
  EXEC (@sql) AT [$server];
END;

panels.title: Memory - Pages Input/Sec, Pages/Sec

panels.description:
Paging File: %Usage
-- Should be less than 70%
-- Amount of Page File in use, which indicates
the server is substituting disk space for
memory.

Paging File: %Usage Peak
-- Should be less than 70%
-- Highest %Usage metric since the last time
the server was restarted.

targets.rawSql:
SET TRANSACTION ISOLATION LEVEL READ UNCOMMITTED;
SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER OFF
DECLARE @sql varchar(max) = "
declare @p_start_time datetime2;
declare @p_end_time datetime2;

select @p_start_time = st.local_time, @p_end_time = et.local_time 
from dbo.utc2local($__timeFrom()) as st join dbo.utc2local($__timeTo()) et on 1 = 1;

SELECT l2u.utc_time as time, counter_name, CEILING(cntr_value) as cntr_value
FROM (
		select collection_time, pc.counter_name, pc.cntr_value
		from dbo.dm_os_performance_counters_nonsql as pc
		where ( collection_time BETWEEN @p_start_time AND @p_end_time )
			and pc.[object_name] = 'Paging File'
			and pc.counter_name in ('% Usage','% Usage Peak')
		--
		union all
		--
		select collection_time, pc.counter_name, pc.cntr_value
		from dbo.dm_os_performance_counters_nonsql_aggregated as pc
		where ( collection_time BETWEEN @p_start_time AND @p_end_time )
			and pc.[object_name] = 'Paging File'
			and pc.counter_name in ('% Usage','% Usage Peak')
) AS data
cross apply dbo.local2utc(collection_time) as l2u
order by collection_time;
"
SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON
IF ('$server' = SERVERPROPERTY('ServerName'))
BEGIN
  EXEC (@sql);
END;
ELSE
BEGIN
  EXEC (@sql) AT [$server];
END;

panels.title: Paging File Usage

panels.description:
< 80%. 
Percentage of processor time spent on SQL
Server process threads.You may also wish
to investigate other Process (sqlservr) such
as Private Bytes, Virtual Bytes, Working Set,
etc to get a fuller understanding of how
SQL Server allocates certain segments of
memory. Usually, these auxiliary counters
provide contextual information and are not
necessary for troubleshooting.

targets.rawSql:
SET TRANSACTION ISOLATION LEVEL READ UNCOMMITTED;
SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER OFF
DECLARE @sql varchar(max) = "
declare @p_start_time datetime2;
declare @p_end_time datetime2;

select @p_start_time = st.local_time, @p_end_time = et.local_time 
from dbo.utc2local($__timeFrom()) as st join dbo.utc2local($__timeTo()) et on 1 = 1;

SELECT  /* Grafana => CPU */
		l2u.utc_time as time,
		metric COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS,
		[value]
FROM (
		select collection_time, metric, [value]
		from (	select	collection_time,
						system_cpu_utilization as [% Processor Time (os)],
						sql_cpu_utilization as [% Processor Time (sqlservr)]
				from dbo.dm_os_ring_buffers
				where collection_time BETWEEN @p_start_time AND @p_end_time
			 ) as up
		UNPIVOT ([value] FOR metric IN ([% Processor Time (os)],[% Processor Time (sqlservr)])) AS UnPvt
		--
		UNION ALL
		--
		select collection_time, metric, [value]
		from (	select	collection_time,
						system_cpu_utilization as [% Processor Time (os)],
						sql_cpu_utilization as [% Processor Time (sqlservr)]
				from dbo.dm_os_ring_buffers_aggregated
				where collection_time BETWEEN @p_start_time AND @p_end_time
			 ) as up
		UNPIVOT ([value] FOR metric IN ([% Processor Time (os)],[% Processor Time (sqlservr)])) AS UnPvt
		--
		UNION ALL
		--
		select  collection_time
				,metric = case when pc.[object_name] = 'Process' then counter_name + ' ('+pc.instance_name+')'
								when  pc.[object_name] = 'Processor' then counter_name + ' ('+pc.[object_name]+')'
							else null
							end  COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS
				,[value] = pc.cntr_value
		from dbo.dm_os_performance_counters_nonsql as pc with (nolock)
		where collection_time BETWEEN @p_start_time AND @p_end_time
		and	(	(pc.[object_name] = 'Processor' and counter_name = '% Privileged Time')
			)
		--
		UNION ALL
		--
		select  collection_time
				,metric = case when pc.[object_name] = 'Process' then counter_name + ' ('+pc.instance_name+')'
								when  pc.[object_name] = 'Processor' then counter_name + ' ('+pc.[object_name]+')'
							else null
							end  COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS
				,[value] = pc.cntr_value
		from dbo.dm_os_performance_counters_nonsql_aggregated as pc with (nolock)
		where collection_time BETWEEN @p_start_time AND @p_end_time
		and	(	(pc.[object_name] = 'Processor' and counter_name = '% Privileged Time')
			)
) AS data
cross apply dbo.local2utc(collection_time) as l2u
order by collection_time;
"
SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON
IF ('$server' = SERVERPROPERTY('ServerName'))
BEGIN
  EXEC (@sql);
END;
ELSE
BEGIN
  EXEC (@sql) AT [$server];
END;

panels.title: %Processor Time (SqlServer)

panels.description:
Number of threads waiting for CPU cycles,
where < 12 per CPU is good/fair, < 8 is better,
< 4 is best.
panels.title: Per cpu - Processor Queue Length

targets.rawSql:
SET TRANSACTION ISOLATION LEVEL READ UNCOMMITTED;
SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER OFF
DECLARE @sql varchar(max) = "
declare @p_start_time datetime2;
declare @p_end_time datetime2;

select @p_start_time = st.local_time, @p_end_time = et.local_time 
from dbo.utc2local($__timeFrom()) as st join dbo.utc2local($__timeTo()) et on 1 = 1;

SELECT	/* Load on Disk */
		time = l2u.utc_time,
		metric = counter_name+' ('+instance_name+')',
		[value] = cntr_value
FROM (
		select  collection_time, counter_name, instance_name, cntr_value
		from dbo.dm_os_performance_counters_nonsql as pc
		where ( collection_time BETWEEN @p_start_time AND @p_end_time )
			and pc.[object_name] in ( 'LogicalDisk' )
			and pc.counter_name in ('Current Disk Queue Length')
			and NOT (pc.instance_name = '_Total' or pc.instance_name like 'Harddisk%')
		--
		union all
		--
		select  collection_time, counter_name, instance_name, cntr_value
		from dbo.dm_os_performance_counters_nonsql_aggregated as pc
		where ( collection_time BETWEEN @p_start_time AND @p_end_time )
			and pc.[object_name] in ( 'LogicalDisk' )
			and pc.counter_name in ('Current Disk Queue Length')
			and NOT (pc.instance_name = '_Total' or pc.instance_name like 'Harddisk%')
) AS data
cross apply dbo.local2utc(collection_time) as l2u
order by collection_time;
"
SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON
IF ('$server' = SERVERPROPERTY('ServerName'))
BEGIN
  EXEC (@sql);
END;
ELSE
BEGIN
  EXEC (@sql) AT [$server];
END;

SET TRANSACTION ISOLATION LEVEL READ UNCOMMITTED;
SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER OFF
DECLARE @sql varchar(max) = "
declare @p_start_time datetime2;
declare @p_end_time datetime2;

select @p_start_time = st.local_time, @p_end_time = et.local_time 
from dbo.utc2local($__timeFrom()) as st join dbo.utc2local($__timeTo()) et on 1 = 1;

SELECT	l2u.utc_time as time,
		metric = counter_name+' ('+instance_name+')',
		[value] = cntr_value
FROM (
		select collection_time, counter_name, instance_name, cntr_value
		from dbo.dm_os_performance_counters_nonsql as pc
		where ( collection_time BETWEEN @p_start_time AND @p_end_time )
			and pc.[object_name] in ( 'LogicalDisk' )
			--and pc.[object_name] in ( 'PhysicalDisk' )
			and pc.counter_name in ('Avg. Disk sec/Read','Avg. Disk sec/Write')
			and NOT (pc.instance_name = '_Total' or pc.instance_name like 'Harddisk%')
		--
		union all
		--
		select collection_time, counter_name, instance_name, cntr_value
		from dbo.dm_os_performance_counters_nonsql_aggregated as pc
		where ( collection_time BETWEEN @p_start_time AND @p_end_time )
			and pc.[object_name] in ( 'LogicalDisk' )
			--and pc.[object_name] in ( 'PhysicalDisk' )
			and pc.counter_name in ('Avg. Disk sec/Read','Avg. Disk sec/Write')
			and NOT (pc.instance_name = '_Total' or pc.instance_name like 'Harddisk%')
) AS data
cross apply dbo.local2utc(collection_time) as l2u
order by collection_time;
"
SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON
IF ('$server' = SERVERPROPERTY('ServerName'))
BEGIN
  EXEC (@sql);
END;
ELSE
BEGIN
  EXEC (@sql) AT [$server];
END;

SET TRANSACTION ISOLATION LEVEL READ UNCOMMITTED;
SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER OFF
DECLARE @sql varchar(max) = "
declare @p_start_time datetime2;
declare @p_end_time datetime2;

select @p_start_time = st.local_time, @p_end_time = et.local_time 
from dbo.utc2local($__timeFrom()) as st join dbo.utc2local($__timeTo()) et on 1 = 1;

SELECT	/* Load on Disk */
		[time] = l2u.utc_time,
		metric = counter_name+' ('+instance_name+')',
		[value] = cntr_value
FROM (
		select  pc.collection_time, counter_name, pc.instance_name, pc.cntr_value
		from dbo.dm_os_performance_counters_nonsql as pc
		where ( collection_time BETWEEN @p_start_time AND @p_end_time )
			and pc.[object_name] in ( 'LogicalDisk' )
			and pc.counter_name in ('Disk Bytes/sec','Disk Write Bytes/sec','Disk Read Bytes/sec')
			and NOT (pc.instance_name = '_Total' or pc.instance_name like 'Harddisk%')
		--
		union all
		--
		select  pc.collection_time, counter_name, pc.instance_name, pc.cntr_value
		from dbo.dm_os_performance_counters_nonsql_aggregated as pc
		where ( collection_time BETWEEN @p_start_time AND @p_end_time )
			and pc.[object_name] in ( 'LogicalDisk' )
			and pc.counter_name in ('Disk Bytes/sec','Disk Write Bytes/sec','Disk Read Bytes/sec')
			and NOT (pc.instance_name = '_Total' or pc.instance_name like 'Harddisk%')
) AS data
cross apply dbo.local2utc(collection_time) as l2u
order by collection_time;
"
SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON
IF ('$server' = SERVERPROPERTY('ServerName'))
BEGIN
  EXEC (@sql);
END;
ELSE
BEGIN
  EXEC (@sql) AT [$server];
END;

SET TRANSACTION ISOLATION LEVEL READ UNCOMMITTED;
SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER OFF
DECLARE @sql varchar(max) = "
declare @p_start_time datetime2;
declare @p_end_time datetime2;

select @p_start_time = st.local_time, @p_end_time = et.local_time 
from dbo.utc2local($__timeFrom()) as st join dbo.utc2local($__timeTo()) et on 1 = 1;

SELECT	[time] = l2u.utc_time,
		metric = counter_name+' ('+instance_name+')',
		[value] = cntr_value
FROM (
		select pc.collection_time, counter_name, pc.instance_name, pc.cntr_value
		from dbo.dm_os_performance_counters_nonsql as pc
		where ( collection_time BETWEEN @p_start_time AND @p_end_time )
			and pc.[object_name] in ( 'PhysicalDisk' )
			and pc.counter_name in ('Avg. Disk sec/Read','Avg. Disk sec/Write')
			and NOT (pc.instance_name = '_Total' or pc.instance_name like 'Harddisk%')
		--
		union all
		--
		select pc.collection_time, counter_name, pc.instance_name, pc.cntr_value
		from dbo.dm_os_performance_counters_nonsql_aggregated as pc
		where ( collection_time BETWEEN @p_start_time AND @p_end_time )
			and pc.[object_name] in ( 'PhysicalDisk' )
			and pc.counter_name in ('Avg. Disk sec/Read','Avg. Disk sec/Write')
			and NOT (pc.instance_name = '_Total' or pc.instance_name like 'Harddisk%')
) AS data
cross apply dbo.local2utc(collection_time) as l2u
order by collection_time;
"
SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON
IF ('$server' = SERVERPROPERTY('ServerName'))
BEGIN
  EXEC (@sql);

SET TRANSACTION ISOLATION LEVEL READ UNCOMMITTED;
SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER OFF
DECLARE @sql varchar(max) = "
declare @p_start_time datetime2;
declare @p_end_time datetime2;

select @p_start_time = st.local_time, @p_end_time = et.local_time 
from dbo.utc2local($__timeFrom()) as st join dbo.utc2local($__timeTo()) et on 1 = 1;

SELECT	/* Load on Disk */
		[time] = l2u.utc_time,
		metric = instance_name,
		[value] = cntr_value
FROM (
		select  pc.collection_time, pc.instance_name, pc.cntr_value
		from dbo.dm_os_performance_counters_nonsql as pc
		where ( collection_time BETWEEN @p_start_time AND @p_end_time )
			and pc.[object_name] in ( 'Network Interface' )
			and pc.counter_name in ('Bytes Total/sec')
		--
		union all
		--
		select  pc.collection_time, pc.instance_name, pc.cntr_value
		from dbo.dm_os_performance_counters_nonsql_aggregated as pc
		where ( collection_time BETWEEN @p_start_time AND @p_end_time )
			and pc.[object_name] in ( 'Network Interface' )
			and pc.counter_name in ('Bytes Total/sec')
) AS data
cross apply dbo.local2utc(collection_time) as l2u
order by collection_time;
"
SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON
IF ('$server' = SERVERPROPERTY('ServerName'))
BEGIN
  EXEC (@sql);
END;
ELSE
BEGIN
  EXEC (@sql) AT [$server];
END;

panels.description: Monitor these counters to determine general benchmark levels set by your user databases and for tempdb.

targets.rawSql:
SET TRANSACTION ISOLATION LEVEL READ UNCOMMITTED;
SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER OFF
DECLARE @sql varchar(max) = "
declare @p_start_time datetime2;
declare @p_end_time datetime2;
declare @object_name varchar(255);
set @object_name = (case when @@SERVICENAME = 'MSSQLSERVER' then 'SQLServer' else 'MSSQL$'+@@SERVICENAME end);

select @p_start_time = st.local_time, @p_end_time = et.local_time 
from dbo.utc2local($__timeFrom()) as st join dbo.utc2local($__timeTo()) et on 1 = 1;

;WITH T_Dbs AS (
	select *
	from dbo.dm_os_performance_counters as pc
	where ( collection_time BETWEEN @p_start_time AND @p_end_time )
		and pc.[object_name] = (@object_name+':Databases')
		and pc.counter_name in ('Log File(s) Used Size (KB)','Log File(s) Size (KB)')
		and instance_name not in ('_Total','master','model','mssqlsystemresource')
	--
	union all
	--
	select *
	from dbo.dm_os_performance_counters_aggregated as pc
	where ( collection_time BETWEEN @p_start_time AND @p_end_time )
		and pc.[object_name] = (@object_name+':Databases')
		and pc.counter_name in ('Log File(s) Used Size (KB)','Log File(s) Size (KB)')
		and instance_name not in ('_Total','master','model','mssqlsystemresource')
)
select [time] = l2u.utc_time,
		metric = case when counter_name = 'Log File(s) Size (KB)' then 'Total Size (KB) - '+QUOTENAME(pc.instance_name)
						when counter_name = 'Log File(s) Used Size (KB)' then 'Used Size (KB) - '+QUOTENAME(pc.instance_name)
						else counter_name+' ('+pc.instance_name+')'
						end ,
		[value] = pc.cntr_value
from T_Dbs as pc
cross apply dbo.local2utc(collection_time) as l2u
where pc.instance_name in (	select i.instance_name 
							from T_Dbs as i 
							where i.counter_name = 'Log File(s) Size (KB)'
								and i.cntr_value/(1024.0*1024) > 1.0
						)
order by collection_time;
"
SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON
IF ('$server' = SERVERPROPERTY('ServerName'))
BEGIN
  EXEC (@sql);
END;
ELSE
BEGIN
  EXEC (@sql) AT [$server];
END;
